mutants.code:
def find_closest_sum_pair(arr, x):
    mx = float('inf')
    ans = [0, 0]
    i = 1
    j = len(arr) - 1
    while i < j:
        b = arr[i] + arr[j]
        diff = abs(b - x)
        if diff < mx:
            mx = diff
            ans[0] = arr[i]
            ans[1] = arr[j]
        if b > x:
            j -= 1
        else:
            i += 1
    return ans
